Method Detail

setCustomGlobalPreprocessors

public void setCustomGlobalPreprocessors(java.util.Map keysClassNames)
Description copied from interface: GlobalPreprocessorChainFactory
Sets a map of custom preprocessors to use. The map has a key to name a preprocessor (to be used in bundle definitions), and the class name of a custom processor class which must implement net.jawr.web.resource.bundle.global.preprocessor.GlobalPreprocessor

Specified by:
setCustomGlobalPreprocessors in interface GlobalPreprocessorChainFactory
Parameters:
keysClassNames - the map associated the keys and the class names.

buildDefaultProcessorChain

public GlobalPreprocessor buildDefaultProcessorChain()
Description copied from interface: GlobalPreprocessorChainFactory
Builds the default chain of preprocessors for resources, be it javascript or css ones.

Specified by:
buildDefaultProcessorChain in interface GlobalPreprocessorChainFactory
Returns:
the default chain of preprocessors

buildProcessorChain

public GlobalPreprocessor buildProcessorChain(java.lang.String processorKeys)
Description copied from interface: GlobalPreprocessorChainFactory
Builds a chain of preprocessors based on a comma-separated list of postprocessor keys.

Specified by:
buildProcessorChain in interface GlobalPreprocessorChainFactory
Parameters:
processorKeys - the comma-separated list of preprocessor keys.
Returns:
a chain of preprocessors
